Title: Relates to requiring certain records checks in child custody proceedings; repealer
Summary: Relates to requiring certain records checks in child custody proceedings involving orders of protection; repeals certain provisions relating thereto.
LawCode: Rpld §842 8th undes ¶, amd §842, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, in relation to records checks in family offense cases involving custody of, or access to, children; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
